I was recently featured on Humans of BioSciences, a series about the people of the [School of Biosciences](https://biosciences.unimelb.edu.au/) at the University of Melbourne (my alma mater). 

You can read the Twitter [thread](https://twitter.com/BioSci_UniMelb/status/1339375265961582592) and the full interview [here](https://biosciences.unimelb.edu.au/news/hbos/jacinta-kong-humans-of-biosciences).
